<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Two purposes to compute the blocks to ignore:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Reduce the IR size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Make the instrumentation(checksum) stable. e.g. the frondend may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generate unstable IR while optimizing nounwind attribute, some versions are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimized with the call-to-invoke conversion, while other versions do not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This discrepancy in probe ID could cause profile mismatching issues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that those ignored blocks are either cold blocks or new split blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whose original blocks are instrumented, so it shouldn&#39;t degrade the profile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// quality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileProber::computeBlocksToIgnore(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;BlocksToIgnore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;BlocksAndCallsToIgnore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore the cold EH and unreachable blocks and calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87783f5762b2359e185e5341a744030a">computeEHOnlyBlocks</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, BlocksAndCallsToIgnore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findUnreachableBlocks(BlocksAndCallsToIgnore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlocksToIgnore.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(BlocksAndCallsToIgnore.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#ad7dc7318244359268414719e0959346e">begin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        BlocksAndCallsToIgnore.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a8cd802dcaed35e1f28ea3cbe4af4eff5">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the call-to-invoke conversion case: make sure that the probe id and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callsite id are consistent before and after the block split. For block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// probe, we only keep the head block probe id and ignore the block ids of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// normal dests. For callsite probe, it&#39;s different to block probe, there is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no additional callsite in the normal dests, so we don&#39;t ignore the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callsites.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findInvokeNormalDests(BlocksToIgnore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unreachable blocks and calls are always cold, ignore them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileProber::findUnreachableBlocks(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BB : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;BB != &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getEntryBlock() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f211484edf604716a6c80030b0a0375">pred&#95;size</a>(&amp;BB) == 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In call-to-invoke conversion, basic block can be split into multiple blocks,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The normal dest and the try/catch block are connected by an</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f211484edf604716a6c80030b0a0375">pred&#95;size</a>(ND) == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ND = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The call-to-invoke conversion splits the original block into a list of block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to compute the hash using the original block&#39;s successors to keep the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CFG Hash consistent. For a given head block, we keep searching the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// succesor(normal dest or unconditional branch dest) to find the tail block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the tail block&#39;s successors are the original block&#39;s successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;SampleProfileProber::getOriginalTerminator(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Head, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;BlocksToIgnore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;TI = Head-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
